name: mssql-dxt
description: A Desktop Extension to interact with Microsoft SQL Server, supporting up to 3 configured connections.

conn1_name.title: Connection 1: Name
conn1_name.description: Unique name for Connection 1 (e.g., 'dev-db'). Required if Connection 1 is enabled.

conn1_server.title: Connection 1: Server Address
conn1_server.description: Hostname or IP for Connection 1. Required if Connection 1 is enabled.

conn1_database.title: Connection 1: Database Name
conn1_database.description: Default database for Connection 1. Required if Connection 1 is enabled.

conn1_username.title: Connection 1: Username
conn1_username.description: Username for SQL Server Authentication on Connection 1. (Leave blank for Windows Auth)

conn1_password.title: Connection 1: Password
conn1_password.description: Password for SQL Server Authentication on Connection 1.

conn2_name.title: Connection 2: Name
conn2_name.description: Unique name for Connection 2. Required if Connection 2 is enabled.

conn2_server.title: Connection 2: Server Address
conn2_server.description: Hostname or IP for Connection 2. Required if Connection 2 is enabled.

conn2_database.title: Connection 2: Database Name
conn2_database.description: Default database for Connection 2. Required if Connection 2 is enabled.

conn2_username.title: Connection 2: Username
conn2_username.description: Username for SQL Server Authentication on Connection 2.

conn2_password.title: Connection 2: Password
conn2_password.description: Password for SQL Server Authentication on Connection 2.

conn3_name.title: Connection 3: Name
conn3_name.description: Unique name for Connection 3. Required if Connection 3 is enabled.

conn3_server.title: Connection 3: Server Address
conn3_server.description: Hostname or IP for Connection 3. Required if Connection 3 is enabled.

conn3_database.title: Connection 3: Database Name
conn3_database.description: Default database for Connection 3. Required if Connection 3 is enabled.

conn3_username.title: Connection 3: Username
conn3_username.description: Username for SQL Server Authentication on Connection 3.

conn3_password.title: Connection 3: Password
conn3_password.description: Password for SQL Server Authentication on Connection 3.

tools.name: list_configured_connections
tools.description: Lists the names of all enabled and configured MSSQL connections.

tools.name: execute_query
tools.description: Executes a SQL query against a specified MSSQL connection.

tools.name: list_databases
tools.description: Lists all databases on a specified MSSQL server instance.

tools.name: list_tables
tools.description: Lists all tables in the current/specified database on a specified MSSQL connection.

tools.name: get_table_schema
tools.description: Gets the schema (columns, types) for a specified table on a specified MSSQL connection.
